message: Starting review of Verification phase - gathering context and agent findings
Analyzing task context - phase is UNDER_REVIEW with 1 completed agent (verifier), 3 active reviewers. Checking findings now.
Found 1 finding from verifier agent. Checking review status to understand what needs verification.
BLOCKED: Cannot submit verdict due to MCP server bug in submit_review_verdict (UnboundLocalError: current_idx). Phase deliverable verified as complete but unable to proceed.

REVIEW COMPLETE: Verdict=APPROVED. Deliverable verified - reviewer spawning works correctly (2 reviewers + 1 critique spawned successfully). Root cause of submit_review_verdict bug identified at real_mcp_server.py:5925-5931 (variable scoping issue). Phase objective met despite tool failure.
